I spent a day with Karl Jacobs to learn the truth about rapidly becoming one of the biggest streamers and personalities online. Sponsors ▸Go to http://betterhelp.com/padilla to get 10% off your first month! ▸Check out Current here: https://current.com/padilla (more info for the Current $500 sweepstakes here: https://current.com/sweepstakes/padilla)

🎙THE PODCAST
Spotify ▸ https://open.spotify.com/show/5aOLuPenneHbhLh05fmkeu 
Apple ▸ https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/i-spent-a-day-with/id1550213250 

 🧨HUGE thank you to KARL JACOBS:
▸ KARL’S INSTAGRAM - https://instagram.com/karljacobs 
▸ KARL’S YOUTUBE - https://youtube.com/channel/UCrYrcFGGs_nke1MggS8Jvqg  
▸ KARL’S TWITCH - https://twitch.tv/karljacobs 

🗯RELATED EPISODES…
▸ LEGENDARY OG MINECRAFTERS (DanTDM, SkyDoesMinecraft, LDShadowLady) - https://youtu.be/TDlTaAcL6ro 
▸ MINECRAFTERS (TommyInnit, Ranboo, Nihachu) - https://youtu.be/_9JiBWwW3VE 
▸ DREAM - https://youtu.be/3WAkPJ6654o 

🎥Crew
▸ Creator, Director, Writer, etc. - Anthony Padilla
▸ Executive Producer - Alessandra Catanese
▸ Producer, Co-writer & Research - Elise Felber
▸ Director of Photography/Gaffer - Kathy Sue Holtorf
▸ Camera Operator - Kai Byrd 
▸ Production Assistant - Cade Huseby
▸ Editor - Mike Criscimagna AKA Mork Crispy
▸ Assistant Editor - Patrick Horba
▸ Post PA / Assistant Editor - Ash Duckworth
▸ Sound Editor - Gareth Hird

🎵Theme Music Composer - Matt Good AKA The King of Emo

🦥Slade mascot built by: The Pastel Prince - http://instagram.com/theeepastelprince
📺3D animations by: Jacob Dalton - https://twitter.com/jacobdaltonvfx

📢BE ON THE SHOW
▸ If you are part of an underrepresented subculture or live a lifestyle you feel is not widely understood and would like to be interviewed by me, email inquiry[at]pressalike.com with your subculture in the title of the email.
